Sentencas: In this work a combined heat and power unit (CHP unit) based on the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology is analysed.
Titulo: Feed-forward control of a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode offgas recycle

Sentencas: This unit has a special feature: the anode offgas is partially recycled to the anode inlet.
Titulo: Feed-forward control of a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode offgas recycle

Sentencas: Thus it is possible to increase the electrical efficiency and the system can be operated without external water feeding.
Titulo: Feed-forward control of a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode offgas recycle

Sentencas: A feed-forward control concept which allows secure operating conditions of the CHP unit as well as a maximization of its electrical efficiency is introduced and validated experimentally.
Titulo: Feed-forward control of a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode offgas recycle

Sentencas: The control algorithm requires a limited number of measurement values and few deterministic relations for its description.
Titulo: Feed-forward control of a solid oxide fuel cell system with anode offgas recycle
